body: I think this is too strict. [RFC2616 ยง4.2](http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec4.html#sec4.2) says that a header's field-content can consist of *TEXT, and [RFC2616 ยง2.2](http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec2.html#sec2.2) says that TEXT is `<any OCTET except CTLs, but including LWS>`, so that would mean that bytes greater than 128 are allowed.
